video.title: ソウルイーター
video.synopsis: Maka and the other students at the Death Weapon Meister Academy must kill 99 evil humans and one witch, absorbing their spirits when they die.

episodes.synopsis: Maka Albarn and his weapon, the Soul Eater, have defeated 99 bad souls. Only one more remains: to evolve the Soul Eater into a Death Scythe.
episodes.title: Resonance of the Soul - Will Soul Eater Become a Death Scythe?

episodes.synopsis: Meister Black Star and his weapon attempt to go after Al Capone to collect their 99 souls but find they must face Al's deadly bodyguard to do so.
episodes.title: I Am the Star! The Big Man is Showing Up Here?

episodes.synopsis: Meister Death the Kid goes after a witch residing at the pyramid of Anubis, only he has to rescue his two sisters who get trapped inside!
episodes.title: The Perfect Boy - Death the Kid's Magnificent Mission?

episodes.synopsis: Black Star, Maka and Tsubaki haven't captured any souls and must travel to the graveyard to face off against the zombie of their former teacher.
episodes.title: Engage the Witch Hunter! A Remedial Lesson in the Graveyard?

episodes.synopsis: Maka, Soul, Black Star and Tsubaki cross paths with Dr. Stein, the same mad scientist responsible for turning Sid into a zombie!
episodes.title: Shape of the Soul - Enter the Ultimate Meister Stein?

episodes.synopsis: When Death the Kid shows up for his first day at Death Weapon Meister Academy, he's greeted not with open arms, but with closed fists!
episodes.title: The New Student: Kid's First Day at the Academy - Will it be an Entrance to Remember?

episodes.synopsis: In Italy, Maka and Soul run into the Meister and Weapon team of Crona and Ragnarok, who share a highly unusual bond with each other.
episodes.title: Black-blooded Terror - There's a Weapon Inside Crona?

episodes.synopsis: Soul and Maka are seriously injured in their battle against Crona and Ragnarok, and it's up to Death Scythe and Stein to step in and stop them.
episodes.title: Medusa the Witch - The One Who Possesses a Great Evil Soul?

episodes.synopsis: Black Star and Death the Kid seek out the legendary sword of Excalibur. But once found, the worst part of the journey might just be the sword itself.
episodes.title: Legend of the Holy Sword - Kid and Black Star's Great Adventure?

episodes.synopsis: Black Star and Tsubaki face the deadly dark weapon Masamune, and as the battle escalates, Tsubaki realizes she must face the weapon by herself.
episodes.title: The Enchanted Sword Masamune - Break the Soul Possession: A Heart Sings in the Rain?

episodes.synopsis: If Black Star and Tsubaki are able to defeat Masamune, they'll claim their first soul. But if Tsubaki fails, she'll be absorbed by the deadly weapon.
episodes.title: Tsubaki the Camellia Blossom - What Lies Beyond the Grief?

episodes.synopsis: Maka makes it her goal to keep Soul safe after seeing her new scar. But the witch responsible for the wound is looking to finish the job.
episodes.title: Courage That Beats Out Fear - Maka Albarn's Great Resolution?

episodes.synopsis: Maka and Soul are having difficulty syncing their wavelengths, a problem they'll have to solve quickly when they face an immortal werewolf.
episodes.title: The Man with the Magic Eye - Soul and Maka¿s Diverging Soul Wavelength?

episodes.synopsis: An important exam is coming, and whoever gets the highest grade gets the Death Scythe. But a determined Maka won't settle for second best.
episodes.title: The Super Written Exam

episodes.synopsis: Death the Kid and the Thompson sisters finish off the captain of a ghost ship, only to find out there's another, more powerful evil amongst them.
episodes.title: The Soul Eating Black Dragon - Scaredy-cat Liz and Her Merry Friends?

episodes.synopsis: After overhearing something disturbing, Kid asks his father an uncomfortable question. Dr. Stein wants to know if Medusa is qualified to be a nurse.
episodes.title: Fierce Battle Aboard the Ghost Ship - The Hell Inside My Head?

episodes.synopsis: Ox Ford raises Excalibur high in the sky! But instead of being rewarded, Excalibur makes him experience the sword's past lives and loves.
episodes.title: Legend of the Holy Sword 2 - Wanna Go Drinking, Gambling, and Playing?

episodes.synopsis: A fun-filled party to celebrate the founding of Death Weapon Meister Academy is cut short when Medusa and her deadly minions attack the school.
episodes.title: The Eve Party Nightmare - And So the Curtain Rises?

episodes.synopsis: Maka decides to settle things once and for all with Crona, while Dr. Stein and his students try to fend off Medusa and her evil army.
episodes.title: The Underground Battle Commences - Break Through Medusa's Vector Arrow?

episodes.synopsis: When Crona proves to be more difficult to defeat than Maka and Soul had imagined, they must push themselves to the limit to be victorious.
episodes.title: The Black Blood Resonance Battle! A Small Soul's Grand Struggle Against Fear?

episodes.synopsis: The fight with Crona takes a surprising turn when Maka puts herself in harm's way, hoping to free Meister from a life filled with pain.
episodes.title: May My Soul Reach You - A Dry Heart Inside Unbearable Isolation?

episodes.synopsis: Free and Eruka are close to releasing Asura. But when they witness a terrifying display of its power, they think twice about their actions.
episodes.title: The Seal Shrine - The Immortal Man's Tricks?

episodes.synopsis: The Kinshin will be sealed unless Black Star and Kid can defeat Eruka and Free. The battle between Dr. Stein and Medusa reaches a deadly climax.
episodes.title: Dead or Alive - In the Rift between Revival and Dazzlement?

episodes.synopsis: Now free from his underground prison, Asura unleashes his powers on Death City. And above all of the chaos, Death himself faces Kinshin in battle.
episodes.title: The Battle of the Gods - Death City on the Verge of Collapse?

episodes.synopsis: Kishin has escaped, and the Death Scythes gather around Death to hear his plan. But Death is also worried about Dr. Stein.
episodes.title: The Death Scythes Convene - Stop Dad's Staff Reassignment!?

episodes.synopsis: Maka, Soul and Crona investigate attacks from a reported earthen golem. When danger arises, the Academy's newest student steps up to the challenge.
episodes.title: The Exciting and Embarrassing Trial Enrollment! The DWMA New Lifestyle Support Fair is Open?

episodes.synopsis: The youngest Death Scythe, Justin Law, helps Death's students fight against Giriko. But Giriko has backup of his own: the deadly witch Arachne.
episodes.title: 800 Years of Bloodlust - Advent of the Heretic Witch?

episodes.synopsis: Black Star jeopardizes Sid's secret mission into Arachne's research facility. And while Meister is looking to fight, Mifune is ready for him.
episodes.title: The Sword God Rises - Does it Have a Sweet or Salty Taste?

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Stein gets the Meisters and Weapons ready for their fight against Arachne. But Arachne isn't the only witch they're going to have to face.
episodes.title: Medusa's Revival! A Spider and Snake's Fateful Reunion?

episodes.synopsis: Death the Kid and the Thompsons fight Fisher King for a Magic Tool, but the Kid is shocked when he learns who actually made the device.
episodes.title: The Red Hot Runaway Express - A Magic Tool Left Behind by the Great Wizard?

episodes.synopsis: Crona loves her new relationship with her students, but when Medusa appears and commands Cruda to do her bidding, will she obey or stay with her kids?
episodes.title: Drying Happiness! Whose Tears Sparkle in the Moonlight?

episodes.synopsis: Hero gets tired of the other students always making fun of him. So he teams up with the legendary Excalibur to rule the school!
episodes.title: Legend of the Holy Sword 3 - The Academy Gang Leader's Tale?

episodes.synopsis: Dr. Stein steps up the student's training when war seems imminent. But first, a battle must be fought between Maka and Black Star.
episodes.title: Resonance Link - Play the Melody of the Souls?

episodes.synopsis: An army of DWMA staff, Weapons and Meisters do battle against Arachnophobia's forces for control of the greatest of Eibon's creations.
episodes.title: The Battle for Brew - Clash: the DWMA vs. Arachnophobia?

episodes.synopsis: Maka, BlackStar, Death the Kid and their Weapons fight the deadly Mosquito. But with their attacks falling short, Soul must do the unthinkable.
episodes.title: Mosquito's Storm! Ten Minutes to Fight in the World of the Past?

episodes.synopsis: When Soul's desperate gamble pays off, it unlocks enormous power within Maka. But even that might not be enough to stop current events from happening.
episodes.title: Unleash the Seven's Resonance Link! A Recital of Destruction and Creation?

episodes.synopsis: After defeating the students of DWMA, Arachne moves forward with her plan, while Death the Kid confronts Dr. Stein.
episodes.title: The Detective's First Case - Kid Exposes the DWMA's Secret?

episodes.synopsis: Black Star challenges Kid to a duel in order to get his mojo back. Meanwhile, Joe Buttataki conducts a secret operations in Death City.
episodes.title: Asura's Temptation - The Big Man's Uncontrollable Irritation?

episodes.synopsis: Crona sets out to leave the DWMA and return to Medusa, with Maka hot on her tail. Meanwhile, Asura and Arachne form a powerful alliance.
episodes.title: Crona's Escape - Show Me Your Smile, Please?

episodes.synopsis: In an apparent surrender, Medusa tells the DWMA how to find Asura and the real Brew. All she asks for in return is freedom and protection.
episodes.title: The Cards are Cut - Medusa Surrenders to the DWMA?

episodes.synopsis: As Crona and Marie head out to look for Medusa, Joe Buttataki realizes that operating the Brew will require one last demonic tool.
episodes.title: Twirl 'Round and 'Round - A New World in Which the Doc Dances?

episodes.synopsis: As the DWMA crew figures out the best plan of attack against Arachnophobia, Death the Kid set outs to find the last demonic tool.
episodes.title: Charge Baba Yaga's Castle! Things are Kind of Gloomy?

episodes.synopsis: The Kid arrives at the village and seeks out the demonic tool, but the situation turns deadly when he's attacked by a weird clown.
episodes.title: The Last Magic Tool - Mission Impossible for Unarmed Kid?

episodes.synopsis: As Black Star nears Baba Yaga's castle, Maka uses her Soul Perception ability to locate Crona, who is now in the clutches of Mesuda.
episodes.title: Weakling Crona's Determination - For You, for Always Being by My Side?

episodes.synopsis: Maka, Soul, and Marie must think on their feet as they fight the formidable Medusa and Stein. Meanwhile, Crona is critically injured during battle.
episodes.title: Anti-Magic Wavelength - Fierce Attack, the Anger-Filled Genie Hunter?

episodes.synopsis: The true key to the Brew reveals itself during a fight between Black Star and Mifune. The secret lays in the very soul of Eibon.
episodes.title: Warrior or Slaughterer? Showdown: Mifune vs. Black Star?

episodes.synopsis: Shinigami uses the demon tool to transform Death City into a giant robot and storms into battle. Meanwhile, Black Star makes a surprising offer to Mifune.
episodes.title: The Miraculous Coffee Table Flip - Fly, Our Death City Robot?

episodes.synopsis: Asura reveals all during a showdown with Shinigami, and Black Star, Tsubaki, and Mifune finally find what they were looking for in Baba Yaga's castle.
episodes.title: Lord Death Wields a Death Scythe - Just One Step from Utter Darkness?

episodes.synopsis: Maka, Black Star, Soul, and the Kid manage to penetrate Asura's barrier, but once inside they find the toughest challenge of their lives.
episodes.title: Asura Wakes - To the End of the World?

episodes.synopsis: As Maka struggles to rescue Soul from the black blood, Kid and Black Star strike Asura enough times to make him change form.
episodes.title: Sink or Swim?! The Men who Transcend the Gods?

episodes.synopsis: When Maka realizes she has the ability to turn herself into weapon, the final battle between her, Soul, and Asura comes down to one crucial moment.
episodes.title: The Word is Bravery!
